title: Windows 10 Home Single Language 10240
description:
This is the collection of Microsoft Windows 10 build 10240
Home Single Language ISO files that are available as
of: July30-2015.

It should be noted that sr-latn-rs is only available
as an esd file, so I converted it with the wimlib script
and cleaned it up by re-exporting the wim files using dism.
Since the patches are very small, I'd say I did a good job.

The rest of the SL images were direct from MS's iso download
page using a download manager to make sure they weren't
stopped short.

Instructions:
1- Unpack the x64 english iso from its rar file to same dir
2- If you need a x32(x86) iso, run the english_x32 patch
3- click the appropriate exe patch and it will create a 
new iso file for the desired lang/arch. It won't delete the
source iso.

x64 isos use the english x64 iso as source data.
x32 isos use the english x32 iso as source data.
To batch unpack them, just run: forfiles /m *.exe /c @FILE
x64 rar is rar5 format. Get a recent version of winrar

enjoy,
murph
